activities: Monitoring, capture and archiving of communication from mobile devices for compliance purposes, whether mandated by regulatory agencies or companies' own data and information retention policies
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal information about individual's mobile devices and their text (SMS/IM/BBM) messages
